value:
There are so many children of
Midgard here... Such an abundance
of adorable little things! Ahh...

I have no attachment to Vanaheimr.
Njörðr and I are like water and stone,
and the other gods are so...uncute.

Come here and let me squeeze
you! You don't mind, do you,
$Nu?

Among the gods, I am the odd
one out in that I have a certain
infatuation with mortals like you...

Vanaheimr and Ásgarðr are both
realms in which gods live, though
we are on extremely bad terms...$k$pNot that I had anything to do with it.

There you are! And every bit as cute
as $Nf promised!

I do hope you can forgive me...
You simply have no hope of
defeating me as you are.
Ahh... Have I gotten stronger?

Perhaps I ought to spend less
of my time napping...

Oh, what joy! Come here and let me
give you a squeeze of appreciation!

Heh. How adorable... Somehow
I knew you would summon me
here, $Nu...

Show me your divine weapon,
$Nu...$k$pI can bless your weapon with
the power of the land.$k$pAnd I will...someday. Or perhaps
I already have...$k$pEither way, I freely choose to give
you my blessing. And in return,
I ask only one thing...$k$pI can give you just one more little
squeeze, can't I?
Oh, aren't you cute?
Into my embrace...
Land undo you!
Bad! Bad!
I had more to give...
I am Nerþuz. People know me as the goddess of the land.
You are cute, but you mustn't poke and prod like that.
All creatures that live upon the land are precious to me—and that includes you and your kind.
The trees, the squirrels, and, oh, the bears, too… All my little darlings.
Njörðr may be my brother, but we could not be more opposite in the way we think.
May all the cute little creatures of this land go forth and be fruitful...
Come here. Let me SQUEEZE you!
Oh, yes.
Am I needed?
For all life on land.
